node.text:
Giving back is a core value for Harris & Ford. That’s exactly why this chemical supplier invests so significantly in the Indianapolis community. They even established and continue to fund an inner-city school while also helping communities around the world. 

 

August is Black Business month and P&G is proud to be working with Black-owned External Business Partners who share our commitment to Equality & Inclusion. #BlackBusinessMonth

Will you guys still be making and selling Kiwi Botanicals? My whole family loves the products especially my hubby and we are wondering what's going on with this product line ? If the name is an issue perhaps rename it???? @proctergamble TIA I hope you continue to make it.

Will you guys still be making and selling Kiwi Botanicals? My whole family loves the products especially my hubby and we are wondering what's going on with this product line ? If the name is an issue perhaps rename it???? @proctergamble TIA I hope you continue to make it.

Boa noite!
Sou consumidor assíduo dos produtos procter principalmente a linha mach3 nunca tive problemas pela qualidade, porém, hj fiquei decepcionado com kit que comprei na Drogasil, kit com mach3 e espelho.
Espelho não fixa na parede ventosa de péssima qualidade, além disso, não é antiembaçante isso é uma propaganda enganosa, deveriam zelar um pouco mais pela qualidade que a.marca sempre apresentou, que decepção!!!! Me senti muito frustado e ao voltar na Drogasil para devolver me disseram que não tinham nada com isso... absurdo!!!! Gostaria de um produto que cumpre o que promete ou meu dinheiro de volta!!!
Aguardo retorno obrigado.

shortcode_media.title: P&G | Black Business Month: Harris & Ford
